mapper.insert: insert into article (type, title, contents, images, tags, created_time, category_id) values (#{article.type}, #{article.title}, #{article.contents}, #{article.images}, #{article.tags}, #{article.createdTime}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update: update article set title = #{updateArticle.title}, contents = #{updateArticle.contents}, images = #{updateArticle.images}, tags = #{updateArticle.tags}, category_id = #{updateArticle.categoryId} where id = #{id}
